Hi, Rust Analyzer is the best! Just wondering if this has already been discussed, or if maybe there's already a solution. I would like to wrap some code with a method or smart pointer, e.g. if I want to put a box around this LinkedList:

image.png

It would be really cool if that action menu had an option like Wrap code and then if I put in Box::new or Option it would know to put the code inside the parenthesis. Because in Rust it's very common for me to wrap things with Boxes / Options etc.
